Mendokusai

Tartarus

Always Tired

06 Oct 2018

Much like Post Malone, I am also a hyper-rich international hip-hop sensation always tired. Perhaps it's a lack of vitamin-D, or due to my less than ideal diet, because I'm depressed, or down to the incessant wailing of my newborn child during the night. Either which way, it sucks, and I need to do something about it.
